thread.title: Tim Bradbury pranks primary school in viral video
thread.title_full: Tim Bradbury pranks primary school in viral video

title: Tim Bradbury pranks primary school in viral video
text: Share this article Share Whenever the adults ask him to wake her up he insists he's tried and failed and even pretends to 'call' loudly to his mother. 'She won't be up for hours,' he says. One woman starts to see through the joke, 'I don't think you come to our school do you?' she says - but he remains defiant. He even asks another man, 'Are you my real dad?' The teachers can be heard laughing on the other end and eventually clock on to the hoax and, after six minutes, hang up on Bradbury. Some viewers have speculated whether the school is Newall Green Primary School in Manchester. Further excuses include just saying he's in the class with all his friends and just calls his teacher, 'Miss' One woman, starts to see through the joke. 'I don't think you come to our school do you?' she says - but he remains defiant The video has since been viewed on Facebook well over seven million times. Many have found the footage hilarious but pothers point out that he was wasting the educators' time and would have caused concern. 'This is pure GOLD,' one said, while another commented: 'It's funny but I bet those teachers were panicking a bit'. 'He's an idiot He could at least inform the school it was a hoax call. Was funny at first but he carried it on for too long', a third remonstrated. Others agreed: 'What a d***head ,when he keep saying is mum's asleep and won't wake up the school he called and more importantly the admin lady would have thought this mum had died and was trying to get his him information so she could get help sent to him'. Another commenter said: 'Its a good thing the school realised its a hoax before the police where brought in and all that time and resources wasted looking for him... just saying.'
